name: My 'Lil Mon!
description:
One day, you discover a mysterious egg on your doorstep. Hatching it will open up an amazing adventure with your very own 'Lil Mon, unique in every way! Will your 'Lil Mon be a hungry gobbler or sleepy slacker? A playful pet or a curbed critter? Only your actions as a proud 'Lil Mon owner will tell!

  • 4 exciting activities
  • 4 steps from Egg to Final Form
  • 4 possible evolutions
  • 4 bullet points in this list

Made for Porpentine's PetJam 2015 with Increpare's flickgame.
